name: The Wanderer
details: The Wanderer is the balanced starting character, perfect for beginners. With average stats across the board, they offer a straightforward introduction to the game mechanics without any special gimmicks. Great for learning the fundamentals before trying more challenging characters.

name: The Gambler
details: The Gambler lives and dies by chance. Starting with high luck and items that encourage risk-taking, this character rewards players who embrace randomness. The Chaos Dice can save bad runs or ruin good ones - use it wisely.

name: The Paladin
unlock: Complete 5 Angel Rooms without taking damage
details: A holy warrior with high health and damage but reduced mobility. The Paladin excels at tanking hits and dealing heavy damage. The Sacred Tears provide occasional burst damage, making them excellent for both crowds and bosses.

name: The Shadow
unlock: Beat the game without taking red heart damage
details: A speedy, evasive character that relies on dodging rather than tanking damage. The flight and spectral tears make navigation trivial, but low health means mistakes are costly. Mastering The Shadow teaches precision and patience.

name: The Berserker
unlock: Complete a run with half a heart or less for 3 floors
details: The ultimate high-risk, high-reward character. With massive damage but minimal health, The Berserker forces aggressive gameplay. The starting Berserker Rage activates immediately, and the Flame Aura provides melee crowd control.

name: The Alchemist
unlock: Use 20 active items in a single run
details: A tactical character focused on status effects and active items. The Poison Vial makes every hit count over time, while the Ancient Scroll provides burst damage when needed. Requires strategic thinking about resource management.

name: The Mage
details: A powerful magic-user with long range and chain lightning effects. The Tome of Shadows helps with exploration, while Thunder Strike can clear entire rooms. Soul hearts provide good survivability despite low base health.

name: The Merchant
details: A character built around economic advantage. Starts with items that boost coin generation and collection. More money means more shop items, which can snowball into powerful runs. Great for players who enjoy the shopping meta.

name: The Guardian
details: The tankiest character available. With 5 hearts and defensive items, The Guardian can survive mistakes that would kill others. The low speed is a significant drawback, requiring careful positioning and planning.

name: The Trickster
details: A chaotic character that specializes in teleportation and room manipulation. The Dimensional Key provides access to special rooms, while the Cursed Skull adds unpredictability. Not for players who like consistency, but extremely fun for those who embrace chaos.
